Alarm_True	0.95*V0_1010 + 0.95*V0_1011 + 0.95*V0_1110 + 0.95*V0_1111
Alarm_False	0.999*V0_0101 + 0.999*V0_0111 + 0.999*V0_1101 + 0.999*V0_1111
JohnCalls_True	0.855*V0_1010 + 0.855*V0_1011 + 0.855*V0_1110 + 0.855*V0_1111
JohnCalls_False	0.94905*V0_0101 + 0.94905*V0_0111 + 0.94905*V0_1101 + 0.94905*V0_1111
MaryCalls_True	0.665*V0_1010 + 0.665*V0_1011 + 0.665*V0_1110 + 0.665*V0_1111
MaryCalls_False	0.98901*V0_0101 + 0.98901*V0_0111 + 0.98901*V0_1101 + 0.98901*V0_1111
